purpleculture_pinyin:
léng
corner; edge; arris (sharp ridge formed by two surfaces meeting at an edge); protrusion; square beam; variant of 棱
угол; край; arris (острый гребень, образованный двумя поверхностями, сходящимися на краю); выступ; квадратный брус; вариант 棱
rtega_mnemonic:
稜稜RS
棱棱		corner, edge, angle, square block
  • grain 禾 and plants 木 grow slowly 夌 around corners and edges at angles with the ground
purpleculture_info:
(Trad.: 稜)
Pictophonetic: 夌 indicates the sound; 木 (wood) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
棱镜 [ léng jìng ]: prism; prismatic lens
棱角 [ léng jiǎo ]: edge and corner; protrusion; sharpness (of a protrusion); craggy; ridge corner
模棱两可 [ mó léng liǎng kě ]: equivocal; ambiguous
有棱有角 [ yǒu léng yǒu jiǎo ]: (of a shape) sharp and clearcut; (of a person) definite in his opinion
三棱镜 [ sān léng jìng ]: (triangular) prism
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 木 [ mù ] tree; wood, lumber; wooden
    • 夌 [ líng ] to dawdle; the name of the father of the Emperor Yao
heisig_chinese_memo: The rice seedlings don't like spending nights sleeping in the the ground now so they've moved the edge of the branch of a tree because it has a nice view.
Ru_trainchinese:
lēng: (графема) используется для образования звукоподражаний и некоторых прилагательных
léng: (сущ) грань, ребро; гребни, рифление
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The rice seedlings don't like spending nights sleeping in the the ground now so they've moved the edge of the branch of a tree because it has a nice view.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " wood " and "夌", the original meaning is square wood with four corners. "Said Wen": "Qiye. From the wood, the sound." "The Book of the Later Han-Ban Gu Chuan 1": "The Fengque of Bimen is set up, and the golden bird lives on the ridge."

" Edge " also refers to the transfer of the surface and the surface of an object at that corner. Tang Hanyu's "Autumn Huai Poetry" fourth: "Sit on the Qingxiao scroll, and Nanshan sees Gao Ling."

" Edge " can express power. "Book of the Later Han-Ban Gu Chuan 2": "In the eyes of Xia and Bude, look at Si Yi and fight against the edge."

" Ling " also expresses sternness. "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty·Wang Yun Biography": "Yun Xing is rigid and ill, and he was afraid of Dong Zhuo's wolves at first, so the picture is drawn."

" Ring " also refers to the ridge, which is also used as a unit to approximate the distance of a field. Qing Jinkun "Longhua Bridge Wild View": "A bay of flowing water reflects the river bridge, and Qianling Lake fields look into the distance."

" Range " can also mean absence and daze. "The Strange Status Quo I've Witnessed in Twenty Years" Chapter 14: "I saw Jizhi holding a newspaper and publishing there."
humanum_short_description_en: From the sound of " wood " and "夌", the original meaning is square wood with four corners.
humanum_full_description:
從「木」，「夌」聲，本義為方形有四角的木。《說文》：「柧也。从木，夌聲。」《後漢書‧班固傳上》：「設璧門之鳳闕，上柧棱而棲金雀。」

　　「棱」也指一物體的面與面交接之處，即棱角。唐韓愈〈秋懷詩〉之四：「清曉卷書坐，南山見高棱。」

　　「棱」可表示威勢。《後漢書‧班固傳下》：「目中夏而布德，瞰四裔而抗棱。」

　　「棱」也表示嚴厲。《後漢書‧王允傳》：「允性剛棱疾惡，初懼董卓豺狼，故折節圖之。」

　　「棱」還指田埂，亦用作約計田畝遠近多少的單位。清金焜〈龍華橋野眺〉：「一灣流水映溪橋，千棱湖田入望遙。」

　　「棱」還可表示失神、發呆。《二十年目睹之怪現狀》第14回：「只見繼之拿着一張報紙，在那裏發棱。」
humanum_short_description: 從「木」，「夌」聲，本義為方形有四角的木。

棱 (Trad.: 稜)
Pinyin: léng
English Definition: corner; edge; arris (sharp ridge formed by two surfaces meeting at an edge); protrusion; square beam; variant of 棱
Total strokes: 12; Radical: 木
Pictophonetic: 夌 indicates the sound; 木 (wood) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 木 [ mù ] tree; wood, lumber; wooden
    • 夌 [ líng ] to dawdle; the name of the father of the Emperor Yao

從「 木 」，「 夌 」聲，本義為方形有四角的木。《說文》：「柧也。从木，夌聲。」《後漢書‧班固傳上》：「設璧門之鳳闕，上柧棱而棲金雀。」 「 棱 」也指一物體的面與面交接之處，即棱角。唐韓愈〈秋懷詩〉之四：「清曉卷書坐，南山見高棱。」 「 棱 」可表示威勢。《後漢書‧班固傳下》：「目中夏而布德，瞰四裔而抗棱。」 「 棱 」也表示嚴厲。《後漢書‧王允傳》：「允性剛棱疾惡，初懼董卓豺狼，故折節圖之。」 「 棱 」還指田埂，亦用作約計田畝遠近多少的單位。清金焜〈龍華橋野眺〉：「一灣流水映溪橋，千棱湖田入望遙。」 「 棱 」還可表示失神、發呆。《二十年目睹之怪現狀》第14回：「只見繼之拿着一張報紙，在那裏發棱。」
From the sound of " wood" and " 夌", the original meaning is square wood with four corners. "Said Wen": "Qiye. From the wood, the sound." "The Book of the Later Han-Ban Gu Chuan 1": "The Fengque of Bimen is set up, and the golden bird lives on the ridge." " Edge" also refers to the transfer of the surface and the surface of an object at that corner. Tang Hanyu's "Autumn Huai Poetry" fourth: "Sit on the Qingxiao scroll, and Nanshan sees Gao Ling." " Edge" can express power. "Book of the Later Han-Ban Gu Chuan 2": "In the eyes of Xia and Bude, look at Si Yi and fight against the edge." " Ling" also expresses sternness. "The Book of the Later Han Dynasty·Wang Yun Biography": "Yun Xing is rigid and ill, and he was afraid of Dong Zhuo's wolves at first, so the picture is drawn." " Ring" also refers to the ridge, which is also used as a unit to approximate the distance of a field. Qing Jinkun "Longhua Bridge Wild View": "A bay of flowing water reflects the river bridge, and Qianling Lake fields look into the distance." " Range" can also mean absence and daze. "The Strange Status Quo I've Witnessed in Twenty Years" Chapter 14: "I saw Jizhi holding a newspaper and publishing there."

Liushutong characters (1)

棱字的基本解释

棱
léng
物体上的条状突起，或不同方向的两个平面相连接的部分：棱角。瓦棱。棱椎（多面体的一种）。三棱镜。模棱两可。
神灵之威，威势：威棱。

棱
lēng
〔不棱登〕口语赘词，用于某些形容词后，含厌恶意，如“傻棱棱棱”。

棱
líng
〔穆棱〕地名，在中国黑龙江省。

棱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［léng］
［《廣韻》鲁登切，平登，來。］
(1)有四角的木。
(2)物体的棱角。
(3)物体上呈条状凸起的部分。
(4)将物体的边角放于另一物之上。
(5)威势。
(6)严厉。
(7)见“棱棱”。
[②]［lèng］
(1)田埂。古亦用作约计田亩远近多少的单位。
(2)失神，发呆。
[③]［lēng］
义未详。
[④]［líng］
地名用字。黑龙江省有穆棱县。

棱字的英文翻译

◎ 棱
arris, edge, ridge

棱字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　棱； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页534第16
【廣韻】魯登切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】盧登切，?冷平聲。或作楞，俗作稜。【說文】柧也。【廣韻】四方木也。　又殿堂上最高處曰柧棱。見柧字註。　又神靈之威曰棱。【前漢·李廣傳】威棱憺乎列國。　又剛棱。【後漢·王允傳】剛棱疾惡。　又模棱，持兩端。【唐書·蘇味道傳】常謂人曰：決事不欲明白，誤則有悔，模稜持兩端可也。世號模棱手。　又【集韻】閭承切，音陵。義同。　又【集韻】丑升切，音僜。吳人謂酢柚爲棱。

棱字的源字形

棱字的起名意思

：指物体上不同方向的两个平面连结的部分。有棱有角。也指威势、神灵之威、严厉。

edge
Basic explanation of words
edge
léng
A strip-like protrusion on an object, or a part connected by two planes in different directions: edges and corners. Walen. Pyramid (a type of polyhedron). Three prisms. Ambiguous.
The power of the gods, power: Wei Leng.
edge
lēng
〔不岭登] The colloquial superfluous words are used after certain adjectives, and they contain malice, such as "silly rim rim rim".
edge
líng
[Muling] The place name is in Heilongjiang Province, China.
edge
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［léng］
["Guangyun" Lu Dengqie, Ping Deng, come. ]
(1) Wood with four corners.
(2) The edges and corners of the object.
(3) The protruding part on the object.
(4) Put the corners of the object on top of another object.
(5) Power.
(6) Stern.
(7) See "Edges".
[②]［lèng］
(1) Rand. In ancient times, it was also used as a unit for calculating the distance of acres.
(2) Lost, in a daze.
[③] [lēng]
The meaning is unclear.
[④]［líng］
Place names in words. There is Muling County in Heilongjiang Province.
edge

◎ Edge
arris, edge, ridge
edge
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　結; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 534 16
[Guang Yun] Lu Dengqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] Lu Dengqie,? Leng Pingsheng. Or as a flute, or as an edge. [Said the text] Yu Ye. [Guang Yun] Square wood also.　The highest point in the hall is called Ziling. See the note to the word 柧.　The power of the gods is called Leng. 【Previous Han·Li Guang Chuan】Weiling almost all countries.　Ranging again. [The Legend of Later Han·Wang Yun] Gangren is sick and evil.　Vaguely, holding both ends. [Tang Shu·Su Weiwei Biography] It is often said that people do not want to understand the decision, and regret if they make a mistake. The world number is ambiguous.　[Jiyun] Lu Chengqie, Yinling. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Ugly rises and cuts, and sound wins. The Wu people said that the pomelo is the edge.
edge
Source glyph
edge
Name meaning
: Refers to the part connected by two planes in different directions on an object. There are edges and corners. It also refers to the mighty power, the power of the gods, and the sternness.
棱
形声字。木表意,其形像树木,表示棱是四方形的木头;麦(ling)表声,麦是陵的本字,有突起意,表示四方形的木头有
突起的棱角。本义是四方形的木头。引申指器物的棱角。

桌~。2物体表面呈条状突起的部分:瓦~「眉~1支~。9

Пиктофонетические символы.
Дерево означает, что его форма напоминает дерево, что означает, что края квадратные; mai (ling) означает, что звук, mai - это исходное слово для ling, которое имеет выступающее значение, что означает, что квадратное дерево имеет выступающие края и углы.
Первоначальное значение - квадратное дерево.
Расширение относится к краям и углам посуды.

léng, lèng, líng
